chinese: 好俏不穿棉,冻死不可怜
pinyin: hǎo qiào bù chuān mián, dòng sǐ bù kě lián
meaning: Suffering for fashion; Freezing to look cool without sympathy
description: A proverb meaning if you dress lightly just to look good (fashionable) and freeze to death, you don't deserve pity. Similar to "fashion over function".

examples.chinese: 你应该穿厚厚的,好俏不穿棉,冻死不可怜
examples.translation: You should dress warmly; suffering for fashion gets no sympathy.

examples.chinese: 好俏不穿棉,冻死不可怜,多穿衣,东北的顶不住啊
examples.translation: Don't suffer for fashion, wear more clothes, you can't withstand the cold in the Northeast.

examples.chinese: 看这温度,穿暖和点吧,好俏不穿棉,冻死不可怜
examples.translation: Look at the temperature, dress warmer, don't freeze yourself just to look good.
